My Sketchbooks

"Art"

Role

Drawer

Words

Illustration, Landscape, Portrait, Doodle, Watercolor, Guache, Pen, Pencil, Brush

I've been keeping a sketchbook for decades. Sometimes the sketches become larger-scale drawings or paintings, but more often than not they live and die within the sketchbooks. I always hate my drawings, as they're derivative and amateurish, but after a few years I can look back on them with something like appreciation.
